accept_eula.description: Whether model terms of use have been accepted
accept_eula.title: Accept Eula

metadata_name.description: Name of the jumpstart endpoint object
metadata_name.title: Metadata Name

model_id.description: Unique identifier of the model within the hub
model_id.title: Model Id

model_version.description: Semantic version of the model to deploy (e.g. 1.0.0)
model_version.title: Model Version

instance_type.description: EC2 instance type for the inference server
instance_type.title: Instance Type

endpoint_name.description: Name of SageMaker endpoint; empty string means no creation
endpoint_name.title: Endpoint Name

tls_certificate_output_s3_uri.description: S3 URI to write the TLS certificate
tls_certificate_output_s3_uri.title: Tls Certificate Output S3 Uri
